Text:
does anyone know how to put more than one movie or carton on a dvd? i know there is some way cause my uncle does it but I dunno how. I'm new to this.

thanks
@sweetdreama get a dvd burning program example: convertx  then when you add a video just add another to the project and as long as it fits the disk your using your good to go.
Sorry wanted to also say thanks MKVGUY!
